lead_paragraph: Las Palmas striker Sergio Ezequiel Araujo was sentenced to nine months in prison by a Spanish court on Tuesday after being found guilty of a driving offence but he is unlikely to serve time in jail.

headline.print_headline: Las Palmas' Araujo Likely to Avoid Jail for Driving Offence
headline.main: Las Palmas' Araujo Likely to Avoid Jail for Driving Offence

snippet: Las Palmas striker Sergio Ezequiel Araujo was sentenced to nine months in prison by a Spanish court on Tuesday after being found guilty of a driving offence but he is unlikely to serve time in jail....
